apihelp-helppanelquestionposter-summary: Handle questions posted via the help panel for the current user.
apihelp-helppanelquestionposter-param-bo: The text of the question provided by the user.
apihelp-helppanelquestionposter-param-so: The component at the source of the question. Valid values are 'helppanel', 'homepage-help', and 'homepage-mentorship'
apihelp-helppanelquestionposter-param-re: The relevant title, if selected, to include with the question.
apihelp-helppanelquestionposter-param-em: The optional email address, if the user has an unconfirmed email or no email, to use for sending a verification email.
